title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8144.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8144.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 14. Route
14 from the Schuyler-Chemung county line to the Schuyler-Yates county line in
the Villages of Montour Falls and Watkins Glen and the Towns of Montour, Dix
and Reading. (b) Route 14A. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 14A between Route 14 at Gabriels

Junction and the Yates county line in the Town of Reading. (c) Salt Point Road, CR 30, between Route 14
and the International Salt Company terminal in the Village of Watkins Glen and
the Town of Reading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8144.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
